gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hornets 124, Spurs 120
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hornets defeated the Spurs 124-120.  LaMelo Ball led Charlotte wit 28 points and eight assists as Brandon Miller (24 points, nine rebounds), Miles Bridges (23 points, six rebounds), and P.J. Washington (20 points, six rebounds) totaled 67 points. Keldon Johnson led six Spurs in double-figures with 25 points, four rebounds, and three assists as Zach Collins (16 points, three rebounds, four assists) and Devin Vassell (17 points, five rebounds, seven assists) totaled 33 points.
